title: Who sings the song 'please don't touch'? - Quora

response.answer_text: The version I know is a collaborative effort by British bands Motörhead and Girlschool. I think they called themselves’headgirl’ for the purpose of this record . I still have the 10 inch vinyl somewhere. It’s fantastic!
There are 2 songs I am aware of with this title 2019 Raye Raye Please Don’t Touch 1981 Motorhead + Girlschool (Headgirl) please don't - Google Search I'm guessing you mean the newer one
